00031 /*
00032  * This file is ripped from x86/mtarch.h of the Contiki Multi-threading library.
00033  * Fredrik Osterlind <fros@sics.se>
00034  */
00035 #ifndef __COOJA_MTARCH_H__
00036 #define __COOJA_MTARCH_H__
00037 
00038 #ifndef COOJA_MTARCH_STACKSIZE
00039 #define COOJA_MTARCH_STACKSIZE 1024
00040 #endif /* COOJA_MTARCH_STACKSIZE */
00041 
00042 struct cooja_mtarch_thread {
00043   unsigned long sp;  /* Note: stack pointer must be first var in struct! */
00044   unsigned long stack[COOJA_MTARCH_STACKSIZE];
00045 };
00046 
00047 struct cooja_mt_thread;
00048 
00049 int cooja_mtarch_stack_usage(struct cooja_mt_thread *t);
00050 
00051 #endif /* __COOJA_MTARCH_H__ */
00052
